# Types-Capabilities

[![MetaCPAN](https://img.shields.io/cpan/v/Types-Capabilities.svg)](https://metacpan.org/release/Types-Capabilities)
[![Licence](https://img.shields.io/cpan/l/Types-Capabilities)](https://metacpan.org/dist/Types-Capabilities/source/LICENSE)
[![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/issues)
[![CI](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/actions)
[![Coveralls](https://coveralls.io/repos/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/badge.svg?branch=master&amp;service=github)](https://coveralls.io/github/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities)
[![Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities)

Perl 5 distribution Types-Capabilities; see [homepage](https://metacpan.org/release/Types-Capabilities)
for downloads and documentation.

Directly installing from GitHub is not recommened; download the distribution
from the CPAN.

## Issues

Please report any issues via [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/tobyink/p5-types-capabilities/issues).
